title: Monster Pack Vol. 1
description: A diverse collection of beast sounds, including Orcs, Undead, Goblins, Demons, and more. Perfect for adding realism and impact to your games or films.
longDescription:
Preview.

Youtube - https://youtu.be/7-4hFasND2s

SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/weeve-652545256/monster-pack-vol-1


*Elevate your fantasy games, films, and multimedia projects with our Monster Sound Pack, a meticulously curated collection of high-quality audio designed to bring your most fearsome creatures to life. This pack includes a wide array of sounds, ranging from the guttural growls of Orcs to the eerie whispers of Undead, the mischievous cackles of Goblins, the spine-chilling shrieks of Ghouls, and much more. Whether you’re developing a dark fantasy RPG, a horror film, or a thrilling adventure game, this sound pack is your go-to resource for adding depth, tension, and realism to your creations.


Sorts.

  • Creature Beast - 42
  • Demon - 13
  • Ghoul - 20
  • Little Creatures (Frog Type - 6/ Bird Type - 11/ Goblin - 5/ Infected - 4)
  • Orc - 56
  • Undead - 10
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 167

Number of Audio Cues: 167

Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)

Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)

Bit Depth : 16bit Depth (Standard)

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: Approximately 4 minutes and 31 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes:

  • Ideal for use in game development, film production, animations, and other multimedia projects.
  • Customer support is available for any inquiries regarding the use of the Monster Sound Pack.
